content:
Hi, guys. My name is Zhibang Oliver Xu, you can call me Zhibang or Oliver. After more than ten years of study in Geographic Information Science(GIS), I am currently conducting research at the Institute of Urban Environment, Chinese Academy of Sciences(CAS). My study interest is to use geographic information and remote sensing technology to solve theoretical and practical problems in cities and to contribute to the sustainable development of cities. I like playing football, table tennis and swimming in my spare time. I am also a fan of Liverpool FC. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.
